translation: Our march must be firm and vigorous; I determined that the Justice of the Peace of this parish should remove all the ponchos that had been made in the district and place them in the depot that I will create under the direction of Captain Francisco Xavier, Commander of the Northern site; and likewise, to send to citizen Manuel Rodrigues Cordeiro, to forward this to Your Excellency Your Excellency.
